text.easy_mob_farm.capture: ► Target mob and right click to capture
text.easy_mob_farm.release: ► Left click on empty place to release %1$s
text.easy_mob_farm.supported_mobs: The mob farm is able to process the following type of mobs:
text.easy_mob_farm.supported_creative: The mob farm is able to process all types of mobs
text.easy_mob_farm.supported_animals: The animal farm is able to process the following type of animals:
text.easy_mob_farm.supported_monster: The monster farm is able to process the following type of monster:
text.easy_mob_farm.mob_farm_template: This mob farm template is used to build the different kind of mob farms. It will not work on his own.
message.easy_mob_farm.warning_full: Your Easy Mob Farm (%1$s) at %2$s is full and unable to store: %3$s!
